name: Buffalo or Barbeque Chicken and Rice Wraps
author: Uncle Ben's
summary: Pre-cooked shredded chicken and Uncle Ben's® Ready Rice® Whole Grain Brown combine with basic pantry ingredients that most of us have on hand to create a super quick, easy, and healthy kid-friendly wrap that even the pickiest of eaters will love.
ingredients: 1 cup UNCLE BEN'S® Ready Rice® Whole Grain Brown
¼ cup Buffalo-style hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's® Red Hot®)
1 cup reduced fat ranch dressing, divided
directions: Cook rice according to package directions
Combine shredded chicken and buffalo sauce in a bowl
Microwave tortillas on microwave-safe plate covered with a damp paper towel on High until warm and pliable, about 20 to 30 seconds
Evenly divide rice among four tortillas and spreading out to within 1/2 inch of the edges
Sprinkle about 2 tablespoons shredded Cheddar cheese over chicken mixture; top with shredded lettuce
Fold in the sides of the tortilla and begin to roll tightly; repeat for each wrap
(Or wrap in foil and refrigerate if serving later
) Serve each wrap with baby carrots and celery sticks and about 1/4 cup ranch dressing for dipping
